quote: Says Momma: “I got handed lemons, too, y’know but I learned how to make lemonade with them… No one ever told me I had to add sugar but that’s life for you. It ain’t sweet.
quote_letters: SAYS MOMMA I GOT HANDED LEMONS TOO YKNOW BUT I LEARNED HOW TO MAKE LEMONADE WITH THEM NO ONE EVER TOLD ME I HAD TO ADD SUGAR BUT THATS LIFE FOR YOU IT AINT SWEET
